actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to give the Comptroller General of the United States the authority to prescribe the monetary limitation for waiver of claim actions by the heads of agencies and Secretaries of Departments.

summary.text: Grants the Comptroller General of the United States the authority to prescribe the monetary limitation for waiver of claims for overpayment of pay actions by the heads of Federal agencies and Secretaries of executive departments. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5584; 10 U.S.C. 2774; 32 U.S.C. 716)

titles.title: A bill to give the Comptroller General of the United States the authority to prescribe the monetary limitation for waiver of claim actions by the heads of agencies and Secretaries of Departments.
